name: Lego Scavengers
description:
Build a ship by dragging pieces with your mouse, fly it with the keyboard and scavenge for new pieces.

Made by Johan Helsing, John Edvard Reiten and Renata Royzmann.

Placed third in the "New Game Jam" competition, arranged by Dagbladet.no and 123spill.no as part of a promotion event for The Lego Movie.
